format: A data frame with 4537 observations on the following 7 variables.
description:
Description
A simple data set drawn from World Bank Open Data. I'll use it to illustrate
some merge issues you might encounter in panel data.
title: A Simple Panel drawn from World Bank Open Data
reference:
The idea for this data comes by way of a student encounter where we noticed
this issue. Data were further generated by the wonderful WDI package.
The underlying data come from the World Bank national accounts (GDP per
capita), World Bank analyst estimates (human capital index), or the United
Nations Population Division (life expectancy at birth).

parameters.iso3c: the three-character ISO code for the country/territorial unit
parameters.hci: the human capital index for the country that year
parameters.rgdppc: the real GDP per capita of the country/territorial unit in that year
parameters.iso2c: the two-character ISO code for the country/territorial unit
parameters.lifeexp: the average life expectancy at birth for men and women for the country that year
parameters.country: an English name for the country/territorial unit
